item.title: Bank Customer Churn Prediction
item.description:
Problem

Predict which customers are likely to leave the bank.

Approach

  • Data cleaning & EDA
  • Feature engineering
  • Interpretable model
  • Business-oriented evaluation

Results

Describe metrics, ROC, what decisions youâ€™d make.

What I learned

  • Connecting data to business decisions
  • Model interpretation
  • Data pipelines
